about_the_game:
Rim (Real-time Interactive Multiverse) is an innovative and immersive online social platform designed to enhance virtual interactions among friends uniquely. Beyond traditional voice chat, it offers a series of interactive three-dimensional worlds, each crafted to provide distinct experiences with various activities.

Currently available worlds and functionalities 🚢
  • Talk with friends using voice chat.
  • Send text messages.
  • Start hanging out easily with a special code.
  • Explore a winter world that's great for relaxing.

Coming soon 🚀
  • A movie theater world where you can watch and comment films together with your friends.
  • A maze to find your way through - be the first to find exit!
  • A big desert that is perfect for exploring and getting lost.
  • A place to try parkour moves.
  • And lots more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620 or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: yes

short_description: Rim offers the fanciest way to spend time with your friends online. Talk, chat, and hang out in a series of crazy three-dimensional worlds filled with various activities.
